properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 4:02AM MST until January 11 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches
over Whitebird Grade. Lower elevations can expect 1 to 3 inches.
Winds gusting as high as 40 mph over Whitebird Grade.

* WHERE...Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 2 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Blowing snow over Whitebird
Grade could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 PM PST SATURDAY
